addCustomerPayment.zzHtmcs: <html:button id="btn_submit"> Pay Now </html:button><html:script language="javascript">$("#btn_submit").click(function(){var win, doc;win = window.open("","_blank"); doc = win.document;doc.write('<html><head></head><body><form method="POST" action="/api/thankyou-payment"><script type="text/javascript" src="https://dev-kpaymentgateway.kasikornbank.com/ui/v2/kpayment.min.js" data-apikey="pkey_test_21102hvZyafqGFFzN0G3NjphkJZ2NPFbRBMRq" data-amount="32199.51" data-currency="THB" data-payment-methods="qr" data-order-id="order_test_211025257366f3c084154b2941ae1fa149c53"></script></form></body></html>');doc.close();})</html:script>
